product_overview: MedQueue AI and EduMatch AI is a dual-platform system designed to streamline healthcare queue management and enhance educational career counseling. MedQueue AI provides hospital admins with tools for patient queue management, bed allocation, and AI-driven wait time predictions, while EduMatch AI offers students aptitude testing and AI-powered career matching with personalized mentoring.
core_goals: Enable hospital administrators to efficiently manage patient queues and bed allocations with AI-enhanced insights.
Provide students with personalized career guidance through aptitude assessments and AI-driven recommendations.
Deliver a seamless and unified authentication and user management experience for diverse user roles including patients, hospital admins, and students.
Integrate real-time backend services and AI models for predictive analytics and interactive assistance.
Facilitate patient access to nearby hospital information, bed availability, and reservations through an intuitive, map-based interface.
key_features: Landing Page showcasing MedQueue AI and EduMatch AI with clear navigation and CTA buttons.
Robust Authentication system using Firebase with role selection for patients, hospital admins, and students.
MedQueue Admin Dashboard featuring queue management, bed visualization, symptom checking, and communication tools.
EduMatch Student Dashboard offering aptitude tests, career matching predictions, and AI mentor chat functionalities.
Hospital Finder interface with Google Maps integration for finding hospitals, viewing bed availability, and reserving beds.
API Integration Layer consolidating backend communication for ML predictions, notifications, and AI chat interactions.
user_flow_summary: Users land on the main Landing Page and can navigate to either MedQueue or EduMatch platforms.
Users authenticate via a unified Auth page selecting their role and signing in or creating an account.
Hospital Admins use the MedQueue Admin Dashboard to manage patient queues, allocate beds, predict wait times, and notify patients.
Students access the EduMatch Student Dashboard to take aptitude tests, receive tailored career recommendations, and interact with an AI mentor.
Patients use the Hospital Finder to search for nearby hospitals, check bed availability, and reserve beds using mapped data and filters.
validation_criteria: All user roles must be able to create accounts, login, and access their respective dashboards reliably.
Patient queue data and bed allocation visualizations should update in real-time and reflect backend state accurately.
AI predictions for wait times and career matches should be tested for accuracy and consistency with ML backend outputs.
Notification and emergency alert functions must reliably send messages through integrated communication services.
Google Maps integration must display correct hospital locations with accurate bed availability status and reservation functionality.
UI components must be responsive, accessible, and align with the modern design system implemented with Tailwind CSS and Framer Motion.
